creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text:
(default publication, node 1 of resource type "news")

(authoring area) -> edit -> news settings
-> Acquire messages from: -> I selected Link and filled in the following rss
feed address: http://www.tagesschau.de/newsticker.rdf (which seems to be ok)

Result: NO NEWS are displayed in my news page 1 (even not when published)

Syndicating external feeds works only with the feed module, which is in the
sandbox (unstable). I have to add a note to the documentation and to the usecase
screen.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Syndicating external feeds works only with the feed module, which is in the
> sandbox (unstable). I have to add a note to the documentation and to the usecase
> screen.

I added a note, I hope this will do for the moment. Maybe the feed module will
be stable until 2.0.1.
creator: andreas@apache.org
